Text: Downloading NOW! Been waiting for someone else to do this since I am unable to rip blu-rays. I will Seed at 200-400KBps once I download it for a while and leave my review of the files as well once I finish downloading.

Okay these are solid real BD rips all native framerate and everything. Only downside is that there is no opening credits to these videos...soooo I will have to say that is the only downside. Otherwise this is a solid torrent, and its been a long time coming.
